name: amdex
description: Finds actor profile pics and populates custom fields. Work has ceased on Amdex, in favor of development for feature parity with FreeOnes instead

arguments.name: use_thumbnail_as_avatar_if_not_available
arguments.description: Use thumbnail image as avatar if proper avatar cannot be found (possible values: 'true', 'false')

arguments.name: dateofbirth_source
arguments.description: Choose source of DOB data (possible values: 'freeones', 'tpdb')

arguments.name: thumbnail_source
arguments.description: Choose source of thumbnail image (possible values: 'babepedia')

arguments.name: alt_thumbnail_source
arguments.description: Choose source of alt thumbnail image (possible values: 'babepedia')

arguments.name: prefer_metric
arguments.description: Whether metric is preferred for height and weight data (possible values: 'true', 'false')

arguments.name: source_settings
arguments.description: Section to choose data from each source (refer to amdex code)
